org.jgrapes.io.util

Class ManagedCharBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedBuffer<java.nio.CharBuffer>
      • org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedCharBuffer

  • public class ManagedCharBuffer
extends ManagedBuffer<java.nio.CharBuffer>
    A specialized ManagedBuffer<CharBuffer> that provides the same methods as CharBuffer by delegating to the backing buffer.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jgrapes.io.util.ManagedBuffer

        backing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagedCharBuffer(java.nio.CharBuffer buffer, BufferCollector manager)
      Creates new managed buffer that is backed by the given buffer and uses the given manager to release the buffer if it is no longer locked.
      ManagedCharBuffer(java.lang.CharSequence backing)
      Creates a new managed buffer that is backed by the given char sequence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagedCharBuffer

        public ManagedCharBuffer(java.nio.CharBuffer buffer,
                         BufferCollector manager)
        Creates new managed buffer that is backed by the given buffer and uses the given manager to release the buffer if it is no longer locked.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
        manager -

      • ManagedCharBuffer

        public ManagedCharBuffer(java.lang.CharSequence backing)
        Creates a new managed buffer that is backed by the given char sequence. The manager for this instance does nothing when the buffer is released.
        Parameters:
        backing -
